September 4, 2012

Interview on Noupe

I was recently asked by the editor of Noupe, Rob Bowen, for an interview. I was shocked and honored to be asked. I've known Rob for a couple of years and he came up with some great questions. If you're interested, read the interview and let me know what you think!
